snippet: Mr. Weissenberg was known for his thundering aggressiveness and rational detachment at the keyboard.
abstract: Alexis Weissenberg, a charismatic Bulgarian-born pianist known for his thundering aggressiveness and rational detachment at the keyboard, and for his unapologetic defense of those traits in interviews, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Weissenberg was known for his thundering aggressiveness and rational detachment at the keyboard.

headline.seo: Alexis Weissenberg, Pianist of Fire and Ice, Dies at 82
headline.main: Alexis Weissenberg, Pianist of Fire and Ice, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Alexis Weissenberg, Pianist of Fire and Ice, Dies at 82
